channel.title: Weird Error, I cant even solve it!, I dont think any1 can >.>
channel.description:
This is the error I get randomly while hosting the server...
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000000 at stream.createFrameVarSizeWord(stream.java:169) at client.addItem(client.java:13921) at client.fromBank(client.java:12846) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20261) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15899) at client.process(client.java:15868) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Ultimate PK Server [fatal] - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000001 at stream.createFrameVarSizeWord(stream.java:169) at client.sendFrame126(client.java:8472) at client.writePlayers(client.java:45) at client.process(client.java:15092) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50)
Please Help!

item.title: Weird Error, I cant even solve it!, I dont think any1 can >.>
item.dc:creator: @Zilchary Zilchary
item.description:
@Zilchary wrote:

No, I didnt compile anything wrong, and I’m not sure you neutralized my server because too many noobs go on moparscape advertisement so I dont put it on mopar.

Read full topic
